targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  battery_level as "SOC [%]"
FROM
  charges c
join
  charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)
 AND p.car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY
  c.ID DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
  battery_level * $BatteryCapacity / 100 as "kWh", $BatteryCapacity as Total
FROM
  charges c
join
  charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)
 AND p.car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY
  c.ID DESC LIMIT 1

panels.description:
Load this dashboard to while you are in a charging sesion. When you open this dashboard it will show the last 15 minutes, but you should click the "Current Charge" button at the top right corner, to enter in Kiosk mode:

- If you are charging, you will see the information from the start time of the current charge session until now and it will refesh automatically every 30 seconds.

- If you are just browsing (not charging) you will see the information of the last charge session.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  start_date AS "time",
  start_km
FROM drives
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
ORDER BY 1

WITH start_process AS (
  SELECT date FROM charges 
	where charging_process_id=$charging_processes
	ORDER BY DATE ASC
 	LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
   EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (charges.date - start_process.date)) AS "Elapsed"
FROM charges, start_process
WHERE 
  charging_process_id = $charging_processes AND
  $__timeFilter(charges.date)
order by charges.date desc  
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  avg(convert_celsius(outside_temp, '$temp_unit')) as "outdoor_$temp_unit"
FROM charges
WHERE 
  charging_process_id = $charging_processes AND
  $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  avg(convert_celsius(inside_temp, '$temp_unit')) AS "inside_$temp_unit"
FROM positions
WHERE
  car_id = $car_id
  and inside_temp is not null AND $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
	$__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
	avg(convert_celsius(driver_temp_setting, '$temp_unit')) as "driver_$temp_unit"
FROM positions
WHERE driver_temp_setting IS NOT NULL AND car_id = $car_id AND $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__time(date),
  battery_level as "SOC [%]",
    (case when charger_phases >= 1 then (case when charger_phases = 2 then 3 when charger_phases = 1 then 1 else 0 end) * charger_actual_current * charger_voltage / 1000.0 else charger_power end) as "Power [kW]",
    (case when battery_heater_on then 10 when battery_heater then 10 else 0 end) as "Battery heater"
FROM
  charges c
JOIN
  charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) and
  p.car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY 1

SELECT  battery_level as "Initial SOC" FROM charges 
	where charging_process_id=$charging_processes
	ORDER BY DATE ASC
 	LIMIT 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  avg(charge_energy_added) as "Added"
FROM charges
WHERE 
  charging_process_id = $charging_processes AND
  $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  avg(convert_km(rated_battery_range_km, '$length_unit')) as "init_$length_unit"
FROM charges
WHERE 
  charging_process_id = $charging_processes AND
  $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 asc
limit 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  avg(convert_km(rated_battery_range_km, '$length_unit')) as "rated_$length_unit"
FROM charges
WHERE 
  charging_process_id = $charging_processes AND
  $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 desc
limit 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  avg(convert_km(est_battery_range_km, '$length_unit')) as "est_$length_unit"
FROM positions
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 desc
limit 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  avg(case when charger_voltage > 2 then charger_voltage else 
    charger_power / GREATEST(0.1, (((2.85 + (usable_battery_level * 0.013)) * 96.0) * charger_power / 100.0)) * 1000.0  end) 
    as "Volt"
FROM charges
WHERE 
  charging_process_id = $charging_processes AND
  $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  COALESCE(g.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(addresses.name, CONCAT_WS(' ', addresses.road, addresses.house_number)), addresses.city))
FROM
	charging_processes c
	LEFT JOIN addresses ON addresses.id = c.address_id
	LEFT JOIN geofences g ON g.id = geofence_id
WHERE
	c.id = $charging_processes

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  avg(case when charger_voltage > 2 then charger_actual_current else ((2.85 + (usable_battery_level * 0.013)) * 96) * charger_power / 100 end) as "Current"
FROM charges
WHERE 
  charging_process_id = $charging_processes AND
  $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

select $__time(date), convert_km(odometer::numeric, '$length_unit')  as "odometer_$length_unit"
from positions 
where car_id = $car_id 
order by date desc 
limit 1;

list.definition: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;
list.label: Car
list.name: car_id
list.query: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;

list.definition:
WITH
aux	AS
(
	SELECT cp.car_id, cp.charge_energy_added / (cp.end_rated_range_km - cp.start_rated_range_km) * 100.0 AS rated_efficiency,
		(cp.end_rated_range_km - cp.start_rated_range_km) AS added_range_km
	FROM charging_processes cp
		JOIN (SELECT charging_process_id, MAX(date) as date
		FROM charges
		GROUP BY charging_process_id) AS last_charges
		ON cp.id = last_charges.charging_process_id
		INNER JOIN charges c
		ON c.charging_process_id = cp.id AND c.date = last_charges.date
	WHERE cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND cp.end_date IS NOT NULL
		AND cp.end_rated_range_km > cp.start_rated_range_km
	ORDER BY cp.end_date DESC 
	LIMIT 1
),  
CurrentCapacity	 AS
(
	SELECT AVG(Capacity) AS CurrentCapacity FROM
  (SELECT (100.0 * cp.charge_energy_added) / (GREATEST(1,MAX(usable_battery_level) - MIN(usable_battery_level))) AS Capacity	
    FROM charging_processes cp
	  INNER JOIN charges c	ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
    INNER JOIN aux ON cp.car_id = aux.car_id
	  WHERE cp.car_id = $car_id AND cp.charge_energy_added >= aux.rated_efficiency AND cp.end_date >= date_trunc('month', current_date - interval '1 month') 
    GROUP BY  cp.charge_energy_added, cp.end_date
  ) AS lastEstimatedCapacity
)
SELECT CurrentCapacity FROM CurrentCapacity
list.name: BatteryCapacity
list.query:
WITH
aux	AS
(
	SELECT cp.car_id, cp.charge_energy_added / (cp.end_rated_range_km - cp.start_rated_range_km) * 100.0 AS rated_efficiency,
		(cp.end_rated_range_km - cp.start_rated_range_km) AS added_range_km
	FROM charging_processes cp
		JOIN (SELECT charging_process_id, MAX(date) as date
		FROM charges
		GROUP BY charging_process_id) AS last_charges
		ON cp.id = last_charges.charging_process_id
		INNER JOIN charges c
		ON c.charging_process_id = cp.id AND c.date = last_charges.date
	WHERE cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND cp.end_date IS NOT NULL
		AND cp.end_rated_range_km > cp.start_rated_range_km
	ORDER BY cp.end_date DESC 
	LIMIT 1
),  
CurrentCapacity	 AS
(
	SELECT AVG(Capacity) AS CurrentCapacity FROM
  (SELECT (100.0 * cp.charge_energy_added) / (GREATEST(1,MAX(usable_battery_level) - MIN(usable_battery_level))) AS Capacity	
    FROM charging_processes cp
	  INNER JOIN charges c	ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
    INNER JOIN aux ON cp.car_id = aux.car_id
	  WHERE cp.car_id = $car_id AND cp.charge_energy_added >= aux.rated_efficiency AND cp.end_date >= date_trunc('month', current_date - interval '1 month') 
    GROUP BY  cp.charge_energy_added, cp.end_date
  ) AS lastEstimatedCapacity
)
SELECT CurrentCapacity FROM CurrentCapacity

list.definition:
SELECT 
  (round(extract(epoch FROM start_date) - 10) * 1000) AS start_date_ts
  FROM charging_processes
   WHERE id = $charging_processes
list.name: current_charge_time
list.query:
SELECT 
  (round(extract(epoch FROM start_date) - 10) * 1000) AS start_date_ts
  FROM charging_processes
   WHERE id = $charging_processes

list.definition:
SELECT id
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE car_id = $car_id
  ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 1
list.name: charging_processes
list.query:
SELECT id
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE car_id = $car_id
  ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 1

list.definition:
SELECT 
  CASE WHEN end_date IS NULL THEN 'now&refresh=10s' ELSE CAST(round(extract(epoch FROM end_date) - 10) * 1000 AS VARCHAR(100)) END
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE id = $charging_processes
list.name: current_end_time
list.query:
SELECT 
  CASE WHEN end_date IS NULL THEN 'now&refresh=10s' ELSE CAST(round(extract(epoch FROM end_date) - 10) * 1000 AS VARCHAR(100)) END
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE id = $charging_processes
